entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waterton Park Gate 10:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Local blowing snow near the British Columbia border. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 at times near noon. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries at times heavy beginning after midnight. Local amount 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
